text: Marco Trungelliti was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Gianluca Mager won the title after Nikola Milojević retired at 7–6(9–7), 5–7, 3–2 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Open Città della Disfida - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Open Città della Disfida – Singles
